channel.title: Question!
channel.description: How can i do that when u press on an NPC, it asks: "Do you want to buy beer?" And that when u press "no", conversation gets closed, but that when u press "Yes", 2 coins go away of ur inventory and u get a beer. And when u don't got enough, the NPC says: "You don't have enough gold" en then when u press next, conversation gets closed.

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Ty!! Going to try out!!

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

find

case 40:

add a dialogue number in that list, lets use 3500

then find skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk =

add this

else if (NPCID == xxxx) // NPC NAME HERE
{
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 3500;
}

find

		switch (NpcDialogue) {

add this below it

case 3500: sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("Yes please!", 2461); sendFrame126("No thanks, I dont like beer.", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

then find case 9157

add this

}else if (NpcDialogue == 3500){ NpcDialogue = 3500; NpcDialogueSend = false; if(playerHasItem(995, 2) { deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), 2); addItem(xxx, x); RemoveAllWindows();

find case 9158

add if (NpcDialogue == 3500) { NpcDialogue = 3500; NpcDialogueSend = false; sendMessage("You don't have enough for a beer!"); RemoveAllWindows();

Dno if thats what you wanted but yer…

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Okay, here is mine for a welcome message (In client.java though not NPCHandler)

[Quote]
case 1:
talk(“Hello, and welcome to YOURSERVERNAME “+playerName+”!”, 945);
break;

	case 2:
		talk("Please take this to get you started.", 945);
		starter2 = 1;
		addItem(392,200);
		addItem(391,1);
		addItem(391,1);
		addItem(391,1);
		addItem(391,1);
		addItem(1323,1);
		addItem(1191,1);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
	break;[/Quote]

Read full topic
